meanings.definition: Accept or admit the existence or truth of
meanings.sent1: She acknowledges her mistake and apologizes.
meanings.sent2: He acknowledges the importance of honesty in relationships.
meanings.sent3: The cat acknowledges the presence of the new puppy by sniffing around.
meanings.sent4: The sun acknowledges the arrival of dawn with a burst of light.
meanings.sent5: The teacher acknowledges the hard work of her students with a round of applause.

meanings.definition: Show that one has noticed or recognized
meanings.sent1: The detective acknowledges the clue left at the crime scene.
meanings.sent2: The audience acknowledges the performer's talent with a standing ovation.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel acknowledges the approaching storm by gathering extra nuts.
meanings.sent4: The wind acknowledges the presence of the mountains by howling through the valleys.
meanings.sent5: The mirror acknowledges your reflection every time you pass by.

meanings.sent1: She acknowledges the support of her family during tough times.
meanings.sent2: He acknowledges the hard work of his team by treating them to lunch.
meanings.sent3: The dog acknowledges the tasty treat with a wagging tail.
meanings.sent4: The flowers acknowledge the rain by blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The student acknowledges the help of the teacher by writing a thank-you note.
